lead_paragraph: The success of Lovie Smith and Tony Dungy promises to alter the stereotype of coaching behavior. Neither man is cut from the the gruff, irascible coaching mold associated with the likes of Lombardi, Ditka or Parcells.
snippet: The success of Lovie Smith and Tony Dungy promises to alter the stereotype of coaching behavior. Neither man is cut from the the gruff, irascible coaching mold associated with the likes of Lombardi, Ditka or Parcells.
